Possessions as Well as Income to Be Tithed 


     As did Abraham, they are to pay tithe of all they possess and all they receive. A faithful tithe is the 
                                                                           67
Lord's portion. To withhold it is to rob God. Every man should freely and willingly and gladly bring tithes and offerings into the storehouse of the Lord, because in so doing there is a blessing. There is no safety in withholding from God His own portion.-- MS 159, 1899.
